Name: Sovereign Alloy Shard
Description: After collecting enough Sovereign Alloy Shard, you can go to the Artisan Guild and exchange them for level 80 purple quality gear at the gear forging Artisan Harvey.
Description$english: After collecting enough Sovereign Alloy Shard, you can go to the Artisan Guild and exchange them for level 80 purple quality gear at the gear forging Artisan Harvey.
Description2$english: This alloy is smelted from materials from powerful monsters and rare minerals, capable of reacting to Engram and emitting a flickering glow. Due to its unique research value, it is highly favored by experts on the Bapharian Legacy.
